function findLocation(str, char) {
 let res = {
 loc: [],
 count: 0
 };
 for (let i = 0; i < str.length; i++) {
 if (str[i] === char) {
 res.loc.push(i);
 res.count++;
 }
 }
 return res;
}

function findMost(str) {
 let res = {};
 for (const i in str) {
 if (str[i] in res) {
 res[str[i]]++;
 } else {
 res[str[i]] = 1;
 }
 }
 let temp = -Infinity;
 let ans;
 for (const k in res) {
 if (res[k] > temp) {
 temp = res[k];
 ans = k;
 }
 }
 return [ans, temp];
};
console.log(findMost("abbcaaa")); // [ 'a', 4 ]
